| History                 = The Sun People are a tribe of humans that live in the [[Savage Land]]. They are descendant of the [[Homo mermanus|Atlanteans]] who made their home their thousands of years ago. They are on of the most powerful and militaristic races in the Savage Land carving out an Empire with plans to dominate the rest. The people of the Sun Empire worship the Sun-God [[Garokk (Earth-616)|Garokk]]. In more recent times, [[Zala Dane (Earth-616)|Zaladane]] became their empress and led them in a war to conquer the Savage Land, causing a [[Garokk (Earth-616)|sailor]] who had been transformed into the Avatar of the Sun God to return to the Savage Land and try to stop them. They have battled Ka-Zar and Shanna many times but have not been successful in their conquest.{{r|Astonishing Tales #3|4}}

It was believed that they were killed when Terminus destroyed the Nuwali machinery which kept Pangea in its tropical climate. The city was destroyed by the ice and cold of the Antarctic climate.{{r|Avengers #256|257}}

During the [[Secret Invasion]], some of them joined Ka-Zar to fight the [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrulls]].{{r|New Avengers #41}}

They were invited to join the [[United Council of Tribes (Earth-616)|United Council of Tribes]]. It was created by the [[Zebra People (Earth-616)|Zebra People]] to bring peace to [[Pangea (Savage Land)|Pangea]]. A member of the tribe was present when [[Torran (Earth-616)|Torran]] of the [[Ethereals (Savage Land)|Ethereals]] crashed the meeting.{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 4 1}}
